## Test plan

- [ ] TypeScript compiles cleanly (`npx tsc --noEmit -p apps/api/tsconfig.json`)
- [ ] Tests pass with coverage thresholds (`npm run test:coverage`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Formatting is correct (`npm run format:check`)
- [ ] Architecture boundaries respected (`npm run check:arch`)
- [ ] New code has tests written first (TDD)
